Australian shares dropped to their lowest in one month, with banks deep under water. The S&P/ASX 200 shed 1.1 per cent, or 80.6 points, to 7040.5 by lunch time in Sydney.

articles.author: David Campbell
articles.title: Anthony Albanese says his cabinet has the largest number of women in history. Is that correct? - ABC News
articles.description: Prime Minister Anthony Albanese says his new cabinet has the largest number that have ever served in an Australian cabinet. Is that correct? RMIT ABC Fact Check investigates.
articles.content:
The claim
The new Labor government has moved quickly to demonstrate its bona fides on an issue that for years dogged the Coalition: female representation in its senior ranks.

articles.title: Australia clinches T20 series with three wicket win over Sri Lanka despite batting scare - Wide World of Sports
articles.content:
Australia beat Sri Lanka by three wickets to clinch their three-match Twenty20 series with a game to spare.
